name: core.ProxyModel
text: provides target model's filtering and sorting

setFilter.text: this method set target model rows filter function, 'filter' function must return boolean value, 'true' - when row must be displayed, 'false' otherwise

setCompare.text: this method set a comparison function, target model rows are sorted in ascending order according to a comparison function 'cmp'

get.text: returns a model's row by index, throw exception if index is out of range or if requested row is non-object

insert.text: place row at requested index, throws exception when index is out of range

set.text: replace row at 'idx' position by 'row' argument, throws exception if index is out of range or if 'row' isn't Object

setProperty.text: replace a row's property, throws exception if index is out of range or if 'row' isn't Object

remove.text: remove rows from model from 'idx' to 'idx' + 'n' position

addChild.text: this method is alias for 'append' method
